title: JAM Session 388 New Student Intake on JICS How to Make it Work for Everyone.pdf

pageContent: © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Presented by Brian O’Neill & Gretchen Aland  Chestnut Hill College  May 29, 2015  New Student Intake on JICS: How to Make it Work for Everyone  Jenzabar’s Annual Meeting  May 27 - 30, 2015 Gaylord Opryland Resort & Convention Center  Nashville, TN © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     The Issue     Past Solutions     Wishlist     Various Stages of Development     End Solution     Questions  Overview © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  The Issue     Move away from a binder full of information mailed to newly enrolled students     Form completion rate was extremely low     Introduce myCHC to new students and faculty/staff (EX 4.6.7.2 and JICS 8.2)     Disseminate information to various offices across campus automatically © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Individual offices mailed out their own forms  •   Disorganized  •   Decentralized     Binder of information  •   Organized and sent by Application Manager  •   Time-intensive  •   Costly     Static .edu page  •   Hidden URL  •   Not dynamic based on the student  Past Solutions © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Creating credentials and roles earlier in process     All offices wanted to be represented     “Set it and forget it”     Interactive and dynamic     Video content     Event registration     Placement Assessments  Wish List © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  Stages of Development  Phase 1  •   List of contained forms  •   Static Links  •   FAQ  Phase 2  •   Table of contained forms with due dates and completion text  •   Literal String Replacers  •   Writing Placement Assessment via eRacer  Phase 3  •   Table of contained forms with dynamic due dates and icon status indicators  •   Video instructions  •   Counselor contact information  •   Admissions information for Writing Assessment faculty  •   Health Services group to access information  •   Aid Acceptance  Phase 4  •   Automatic notepad event registration  •   Event registration literal string © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     To Do List  Stages of Development - Previous © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Due Dates  Stages of Development - Previous © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc. © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.     Mass Add     Daily Procedure     Jenzabar Contained Form     Simple Query     Student Inquiry     Literal String Replacer     Free-form Content     Stored Procedures     JICS Groups  End Solution – Features/Technology Used © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution – Sample Form © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution – Jenzabar Contained Form Setup © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution – Health Services Group © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution – Flow Chart  Deposit   Stage Change  Application Manager  Push to Registration  Application Manager  Account Notification  Application Manager  Account Creation  Helpdesk Analyst  Email update  IT  Role Assignment  Stored Procedure  Login Update  Stored Procedure  Role Removal  Stored Procedure © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution - Procedures © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution - Procedures © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution - Procedures © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.  End Solution - Procedures © 2015 Jenzabar, Inc.
